```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(DiagrammeR)
```

This is the simplest case

```{r echo=FALSE}
grViz("
digraph a_nice_graph {

# node definitions with substituted label text
node [fontname = Helvetica, shape = box]
a [label = '@@1']    ## label indicates the position of the letter

node [fontname = Helvetica, shape = circle, fontsize = 10, fixedsize = TRUE]
b [label = '@@2-1']
c [label = '@@2-2']

node [fontname = Helvetica, shape = egg, fixedsize = TRUE]
d [label = '@@3-1']
e [label = '@@3-2']
f [label = '@@3-3']
g [label = '@@3-4']

node [fontname = Helvetica, shape = square, fixedsize = TRUE]
h [label = '@@4-1']
i [label = '@@4-2']
j [label = '@@4-3']
k [label = '@@4-4']
l [label = '@@4-5']
m [label = '@@4-6']
n [label = '@@4-7']
o [label = '@@4-8']

# edge definitions with the node IDs
a -> {b c} [label = 0.5]      ##[label = ...] adds text on the edge
b -> {d e} [label = 0.5]  
c -> {f g} [label = 0.5]
d -> {h i} [label = 0.5]
e -> {j k} [label = 0.5]
f -> {l m} [label = 0.5]
g -> {n o} [label = 0.5]
}

[1]: 'toss a coin'            ## adds label to each box
[2]: c('head', 'tail')
[3]: c('head', 'tail', 'head', 'tail')
[4]: c('head', 'tail', 'head', 'tail', 'head', 'tail', 'head', 'tail')
")
```
